item.title: Specify Rails Version When Init
item.description: It’s common to installed multiple versions of the same gem. For example, rails with 5.2.7 and 6.1.1, etc. By default, it uses the latest release. To specify the old one, just use command like below, which specifies the expected version with underscode _.
